note: Emission factors can vary depending on factors such as the efficiency of vehicle used; packing/loading density of freight etc.
title: Greenhouse emissions per unit of food transported
subtitle: [Greenhouse gases](#dod:ghg) emitted by transporting one tonne of food over a distance of one kilometer. Emissions are measured in kilograms of [carbon dioxide-equivalents](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents).
sourceDesc: Ecoinvent v3.3, as applied in Joseph Poore and Thomas Nemecek (2018).
